column4: I'm trying to telnet into unbuntu. but I get thr following error: telnet 192.168.1.102 11211
telnet: connect to address 192.168.1.102: Connection refused
so its currently only listening for localhost and nobody outside of localhost ?
as i start memcache from /etc/init.d/memcache start
find the part with the command line "/usr/bin/memcached -m 64 -p 11211 -u nobody -l 127.0.0.1" and change the -l option
do i change -l 127.0.0.1 to -l 192.168.1.102 (ip of machine memcache is running on) ?
sure if that's a static address
maybe it's just not there then?
